prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon that has a round body and elegant wings.
Imagine a Pokemon with a striking black and yellow color scheme, resembling a bee.
Show me a queen bee-inspired Pokemon with a regal appearance and powerful abilities.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a colony, working together to defend.
Design a Pokemon with vibrant colors and a distinct insect-like body shape.
I want a bee-themed Pokemon that can control a swarm of smaller insects.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in forest habitats and has a nurturing personality.
